evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Susan Webber is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and an elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Jonathan St. Goddard is a rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates a family place south of Browning.

evidence.source_document: First Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Rhonda Mountain Chief is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe and lives on the Blackfeet Nation, and owns and operates the Mountain Chief Company, registered with the Blackfeet Nation, that delivers shuttle services across the Chief Mountain border crossing

evidence.source_document: First Amended Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: David Mountain Chief is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe and lives on the Blackfeet Nation, and works with Rhonda Mountain Chief at Mountain Chief Cab Company.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Individual, described as Susan Webber (elected representative of Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations), Jonathan St. Goddard (rancher on Blackfeet Nation), Rhonda Mountain Chief (enrolled member of Blackfeet Tribe operating Mountain Chief Company), and David Mountain Chief (enrolled member of Blackfeet Tribe working with Rhonda Mountain Chief)
